pages.text: With the advent of the millstone, I feel a sudden burst of inspiration thinking of all of the possibilities to develop more advanced forms of technology.$(br2)One thing of special notice is the phenomenal efficiency of these technologies if scaled up beyond a certain point. No manual labor can come close to the level of productivity

attained through automation. I can only assume in the future that I will need great amounts of various items and liquids in order to fully actualize my potential, and this new path in which I find myself on thoroughly excites me. I will have to see what roadblocks and opportunities come to me as I move further in the same direction.
